house_listing.house_description: Absolutely mint condition transitional w/huge frog,spacious bedrooms, eat-in kitchen w/white cabinets, formal living & dining room w/upgraded carpet, huge family room w/built-in bookcases,cathedral ceiling,fan & skylights,huge oversized 2 car garage w/openers,lakefront! Large yard, huge master w/
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Foyer, Garage Door Opener, Pantry,Skylights, Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
